About Carlson Solutions LLC

IT Consulting and Services

See examples of our work below!

IT Consulting

We’ll sit down with you to figure out the best ways to set up Internet systems, Wi-Fi networks, and security cameras that work for you.

Computer Help

We’re here to help with any computer problems you’ve got, keeping things simple and reliable.

Computer Repair

We fix computers to get them running smoothly again, with care and know-how.

Installation of Network Systems

We set up network systems like routers, Wi-Fi access points, NAS, and security cameras, making sure they fit what you need.

Wi-Fi Troubleshooting

We’ll sort out what’s wrong with your Wi-Fi or network and get it back on track.

Device Setup Assistance

We assist with setting up new devices like computers, tablets, or printers to get you started hassle-free.

Tech Support for Everyday Use

We provide ongoing support to help you use your technology confidently every day.

Our Service Area

Based in Chisago County, MN, we proudly serve homes and businesses in Chisago County and Washington County, including the communities of Lindstrom, Chisago City, Center City, Forest Lake, Scandia, and North Branch, with reliable IT solutions tailored to your needs.

About Us

Hi, I’m Caleb Carlson, the Founder and Owner of Carlson Solutions LLC, based in Chisago County, MN. I founded Carlson Solutions LLC in 2025 with a mission to empower customers and small businesses by providing reliable, tailored IT solutions. Whether you need help troubleshooting computer hardware and software, setting up network systems like firewalls and Wi-Fi, or installing network-attached storage and other technologies, I’m here to help you succeed.

Have questions? Get in touch with us!
